messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Adam. May I know your name, please?
This is David. And I'm really frustrated right now.
I'm sorry to hear that, David. How can I assist you today?
I ordered a bunch of KitKats last week, but the payment seems to have gone through twice. What's going on?
I apologize for the inconvenience, David. Let me look into this for you. Could you please provide me with your order number?
The order number is 987654. This is really unacceptable.
Thank you for providing the order number. I'll check the payment status for you right now. Please hold on for a moment.
Fine, but hurry up. I've already wasted enough time on this.
David, I see that there was indeed a duplicate charge for your KitKat order. I'm very sorry for the mistake. I will process a refund for the duplicate payment immediately.
This is just ridiculous. How long will it take to get my money back?
The refund should appear in your account within 3-5 business days. Again, I apologize for the inconvenience caused.
3-5 days? Unbelievable. This shouldn't have happened in the first place.
I understand your frustration, David, and I assure you we are taking steps to ensure this doesn't happen again. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
We are on it, David. Thank you for your patience. Have a good day.
